law.catch_line: Contents of promotional material -- Time limits for mailing.

text.section: The seller shall mail the announcement and form either at least twenty (20) days prior to the return date or at least fifteen (15) days prior to the mailing date, or provide a mailing date at least ten (10) days after receipt by the subscriber, provided, however, that whichever system the seller chooses for mailing the announcement and form, such system must provide the subscriber with at least ten (10) days in which to mail his form.

law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 304, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1978.
